name: Chimeras: Blinding Love
description:
Elephant Games presents the another installment of the much-beloved Chimeras series!

The people of Paris are in danger! When several young men are mysteriously found blind and paralyzed, you’re called in to investigate. This is no ordinary case as you sense that something supernatural is afoot. Can you uncover who, or what, is attacking these men and return the Parisian streets to safety? Find out in this stirring hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

-Haunting Hidden Object scenes
-Dynamic puzzles and minigames
-Immersive gameplay and story rich narratives.

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.
